body:
Use #24650 in the Qt package:
- [x] Group together requirements for `+webkit`
- [x] Group together requirements for `+gui`

To remove the conditional on `MACOS_VERSION` at class level we would need a way to express that the condition is:
```
not self.spec.satisfies('platform=darwin')
```
so I'll leave that for later
title: Qt: rework to use the when context manager
